incidents.title: Brute Force Attack Detected
incidents.summary: Multiple failed authentication attempts detected (4 events). Potential brute force attack against user accounts.

timeline.description: 2025-06-29T10:30:12Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105
2025-06-29T10:30:15Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105
2025-06-29T10:30:18Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105
2025-06-29T10:30:21Z [ALERT] Account 'admin' locked due to too many failed login attempts

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts when passwords are unknown or when password hashes are obtained.

recommendations: Immediately block the source IP addresses involved in the attack
Force password reset for all affected user accounts
Implement account lockout policies to prevent future brute force attempts
Enable multi-factor authentication for all user accounts
Monitor for additional suspicious activity from related IP ranges

evidence.message: 2025-06-29T10:30:12Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105
evidence.raw_log: 2025-06-29T10:30:12Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105

evidence.message: 2025-06-29T10:30:15Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105
evidence.raw_log: 2025-06-29T10:30:15Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105

evidence.message: 2025-06-29T10:30:18Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105
evidence.raw_log: 2025-06-29T10:30:18Z [WARNING] Multiple failed login attempts for user 'admin' from 192.168.1.105

evidence.message: 2025-06-29T10:30:21Z [ALERT] Account 'admin' locked due to too many failed login attempts
evidence.raw_log: 2025-06-29T10:30:21Z [ALERT] Account 'admin' locked due to too many failed login attempts

incidents.title: Brute Force Attack Detected
incidents.summary: Multiple failed authentication attempts detected (4 events). Potential brute force attack against user accounts.

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts when passwords are unknown or when password hashes are obtained.

recommendations: Immediately block the source IP addresses involved in the attack
Force password reset for all affected user accounts
Implement account lockout policies to prevent future brute force attempts
Enable multi-factor authentication for all user accounts
Monitor for additional suspicious activity from related IP ranges

incidents.title: Privilege Escalation Attempt
incidents.summary: Unauthorized privilege escalation attempts detected (6 events). User attempting to gain elevated system access.

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may circumvent mechanisms designed to control elevate privileges to gain higher-level permissions.

recommendations: Immediately suspend the affected user account pending investigation
Review and audit all recent activities for this user account
Check for any successful privilege escalations in system logs
Verify the legitimacy of sudo/admin access for this user role
Implement additional monitoring for privilege escalation attempts

incidents.title: Suspicious Command Execution
incidents.summary: Suspicious command execution detected (2 events). Potentially malicious scripts or encoded commands identified.

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may attempt to make an executable or file difficult to discover or analyze by encrypting, encoding, or otherwise obfuscating its contents.

recommendations: Isolate affected systems from the network immediately
Perform full malware scan on all affected systems
Decode and analyze any Base64 or encoded payloads
Block communication to any external IPs identified
Review PowerShell execution policies and logging

incidents.title: Brute Force Attack Detected
incidents.summary: Multiple failed authentication attempts detected (4 events). Potential brute force attack against user accounts.

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts when passwords are unknown or when password hashes are obtained.

recommendations: Immediately block the source IP addresses involved in the attack
Force password reset for all affected user accounts
Implement account lockout policies to prevent future brute force attempts
Enable multi-factor authentication for all user accounts
Monitor for additional suspicious activity from related IP ranges

incidents.title: Privilege Escalation Attempt
incidents.summary: Unauthorized privilege escalation attempts detected (6 events). User attempting to gain elevated system access.

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may circumvent mechanisms designed to control elevate privileges to gain higher-level permissions.

recommendations: Immediately suspend the affected user account pending investigation
Review and audit all recent activities for this user account
Check for any successful privilege escalations in system logs
Verify the legitimacy of sudo/admin access for this user role
Implement additional monitoring for privilege escalation attempts

incidents.title: Suspicious Command Execution
incidents.summary: Suspicious command execution detected (2 events). Potentially malicious scripts or encoded commands identified.

mitre_mapping.description: Adversaries may attempt to make an executable or file difficult to discover or analyze by encrypting, encoding, or otherwise obfuscating its contents.

recommendations: Isolate affected systems from the network immediately
Perform full malware scan on all affected systems
Decode and analyze any Base64 or encoded payloads
Block communication to any external IPs identified
Review PowerShell execution policies and logging
